cs.LG, cs.QI, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a quantum version of the bandit problem, which is a well-known problem in machine learning (cs.LG) and optimization (cs.DS). The proposed algorithm is based on quantum amplitude amplification, which is a common technique in quantum algorithms (cs.QI). The paper also discusses the behavior of the algorithm on different instances of the problem, which involves analyzing its performance and complexity (cs.AI, cs.DS). Finally, the paper mentions the use of quantum information theory to model the problem (cs.IT).
